reference_name.description: The name of the Human reference genome build. Choices are: hg38_alt/hg38_gatk, hg38/hg38_noalt/hs38, b37_gatk, b37/hs37d5, or hg19/ucsc_hg19

output_gvcf.description: Output variant calls in the gVCF format instead of VCF (default: false)

canonical_user_id.description: Your account's AWS canonical user ID. Used to acquire a Sentieon license

dnascope_model.description: The Sentieon DNAscope variant calling model

is_pcr_free.description: Set to `true` if the data is processed with a PCR-free library prep

n_threads.description: Number of vCPUs to allocate for the task (default: 32)

memory.description: Memory to allocate for the task (default: 64 GiB)
